\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{VisitTerm()}{VisitTerm()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily override object it.\+unical.\+mat.\+parsers.\+datalog.\+Datalog\+Parser.\+Visit\+Term (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{\mbox{\hyperlink{classDatalogGrammarParser_1_1TermContext}{Datalog\+Grammar\+Parser.\+Term\+Context}}}]{context }\end{DoxyParamCaption})\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [inline]}, {\ttfamily [virtual]}}



Visit a parse tree produced by \mbox{\hyperlink{classDatalogGrammarParser_ac4ec9c85e6fdabbb99ac2baec3006717}{Datalog\+Grammar\+Parser.\+term}}. 

The default implementation returns the result of calling Abstract\+Parse\+Tree\+Visitor$<$\+Result$>$.\+Visit\+Children(\+IRule\+Node) on {\itshape context} .

{\em context} & The parse tree.\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
$<$return$>$The visitor result.$<$/return$>$
